meanings.definition: Sound or music recorded on a magnetic tape or other medium.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to old audios of my favorite band.
meanings.sent2: The audios from the concert last night were crystal clear.
meanings.sent3: My cat seems to enjoy playing with the audios of birds chirping.
meanings.sent4: The audios of nature's symphony filled the forest with life.
meanings.sent5: The audios of the ocean waves crashing against the shore were soothing.
